comments.comment:
Mehemai  oya campus giya hamu mahathwaru hodata mathaka thiyaganna ketharam igana gaththath ohoma karanawanam oba kohomada buddimath kiyala
Kiyanne, hemotama adala nethiwa athi, eth ada samaje kellekgen idhul welanam jivithe winasai neda kiyala ahuwama ane ada kale kawda ane oka balanne kiyala ahanawa, kellonge thana ada,, hemotama adala nethiwa athi, ithing pathiwatha rekagena campus yane samahara dhura palathwala ahinsaka lamai, me campus eke eka ekage haiya aran  mul behepu gas wage naki wenakam raja karana ugath nugath manda buddikayo  ara ahinsaka lamai nomaga yawanawa apawithra karanawa manasika wada denawa, ithing  OL, AL  lassanata  liyala samath wela cochchara balaporoththuwenda inne , ithing  mehema ahinsaka lamaige sihina bidinna epa rag ekak hinda rag kiyanne me wage dewal nemei,  ita wada wadapu demapiyanta karana nindawak, man mehema kiyanne, mehema weda jara weda karana ayatai, hoda aya thamai campus wala hitiye ekek  dennek nisa  meka  hemoma athare  pathirila, manasika tharjana mewata pradana hethuwak wela, ithing nugath una api ubala campus gihilla hoda rassa karala  ubalagen pihitak pathanne kohomada mahaththaya kiyala mehema karanawanam, anika mehema karana gahanu pirimi, hodata mathaka thiyaganilla koi sapa windath  ubalata oya paw gewannath  wenawa ,  anna edata karapu paw sihiyata ewi widawanakota, eka deparak  nemei siyaparak mathaka thiyaganilla,anika hithapalla   den oya ruhunu campus eke athulanthaya ratama denagena hamarai, anika  oya campus eke inna ayage demapiyo me news eka ahuwama  ketharam kampa wenawada rate minissu kochchara awaman karanawada,   ithing upadhiya ganna sihina  maligawe mehema apakirthiyata lan karanna epa, hariyata amma wikunan kanawa wage wedak oya karala thiyenne, anith campus walatath me jodanawa ellawela aththe, mage campus mithurane tharahak ne ubala ekka, apata awankawama ubalata mahaththaya kiyala katha karanna  puluwan  respect eka thiyagena upadhiya aran waren  echcharai sahodarek wage illanne, nugath una apita  ubala campus giya kiyala irisiyawak nehe, eth nama katha karaganna epa bn,, meka lankawa budun adahana rataka mehema wenna denna epa, ai ape sanskruthiya kelesa ganne, , campus eka kollek hari meka dakiwi  , eth ubala ekka puthgalika tharahak nehe, mehema dewal karanna epa aye,
